title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
In a pan, cook pancetta until crisp, then add garlic and cook for 30 seconds.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan together in a bowl.
Drain pasta and quickly toss with pancetta off the heat.
Stir in egg-cheese mixture, adding a splash of pasta water if needed.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery and creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and half the spice mix for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or pan-sear chicken until lightly charred and mostly cooked.
Saute onion in butter until soft; add remaining spice mix.
Add tomato puree and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream, then add chicken and simmer until fully cooked.
Adjust salt and serve hot with rice or naan.
